mapper.select: SELECT no, title, content, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, views FROM posts WHERE no = #{no}
SELECT no, title, content, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, views FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (title, content, created_at, updated_at, views) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{views})
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, views = #{views} WHERE no = #{no}
